text: Discover how Vue 3's Suspense feature can enhance user experience.
Vue 3's Suspense component manages asynchronous data loading by showing fallback content,
such as a loading spinner, until the data is ready.
It seamlessly integrates with the new Script Setup syntax and top-level await.
The article also covers handling errors with Vue's onErrorCaptured lifecycle hook to ensure a smooth user experience.
To improve your app's data loading with Vue 3, explore the full article for more insights.
